text: 26.15: Sek 11.12; Mt 27.3Ana mbe han vugap kha nzambarar mbe muuŋgi, “Gu Zisasan nde farve khɨngirim, nde thagɨnan nan nɨɨŋgirie?” Ana maaŋ nzuaim, mbe 30 sirva ŋkɨɨar rarain ana nɨɨŋgi. 26.15 Nza kaŋgi fhu, mba 30 sirva ŋkɨɨar fɨgiveŋ nza ntige wari won nkɨɨar ruei tɨva zɨn vov nta rueim, nta thaneŋ ŋkɨɨa vhɨrvera thi? Ee, nta guma meeŋthɨgi o, mporathɨgi kɨnin ŋgargiap ndi vheza fara muuŋgi o, nza kaŋgi fhu. Ndu Matiu 27.9-10.
